task.title: How do I add a group to my contact list?

titlealts.searchtitle: Chat: How do I add a group to my contact list?

task.shortdesc: Populate your contact list by adding groups to it.

context.p: There are two types of groups: personal groups and public groups.
You create your own personal groups and select the contacts that you want to add to them. Any personal groups that you create display only on your contact list.

You search for, and then add, public groups to your contact list. Public groups are created by your system administrator. Each public group has a previously defined list of members. You cannot change who is a member of a public group.

step.cmd: Select the type of group you want to add.

substep.cmd: Select Add a new personal group to name the group that you want to add.
substep.info: After you add a personal group, add contacts to it.

substep.cmd: Select Search for a public group to find a public group to which you have access.
substep.info: After you add a public group, all members of that group display on your contact list.

step.cmd: Enter a name for the group that you want to add in the New Group field.
If you want this group to be a subgroup of an existing group in your contact list, click Add as a subgroup to the selected group and then select a name from the Add to group field.

step.stepresult: You can add any contacts that you want to display for this group.
